QAPair.Question: What is (are) Hemoglobinopathy ?
QAPair.Answer: Hemoglobinopathy is a group of disorders in which there is abnormal production or structure of the hemoglobin molecule. It is passed down through families (inherited). This group of disorders includes hemoglobin C disease , hemoglobin S-C disease, sickle cell anemia , and thalassemias .
